mapper.select: select r.role_id, role_name from user left join user_role ur on user.user_id = ur.user_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select re.resource_id as resourceId, resource_name as resourceName, parent_id as parentId, `type` as type, url as url, permission as permission from user left join user_role ur on user.user_id = ur.user_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join role_resource rr on r.role_id = rr.role_id left join resource re on rr.resource_id = re.resource_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( user_name, user_password, user_email, user_phone) values (#{userName} ,#{userPassword},#{userEmail} ,#{userPhone} );
mapper.select: select user.user_id, user_name, user_email, user_phone , count(*) as messageNum from user left join message on user.user_id = message.user_id group by user.user_id, user_name, user_email, user_phone
select `group`.group_id, group_name from `group` left join group_user gu on `group`.group_id = gu.group_id where user_id = #{userId} ;
